title: Maestrale — a paradigm-breaking calligraphy font
content:
Maestrale is finally out! Thanks for your help, everyone. :)

[http://www.behance.net/gallery/Maestrale-a-unique-calligraphic-font-fami...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414043025/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Maestrale-a-unique-calligraphic-font-family/9855321 "http://www.behance.net/gallery/Maestrale-a-unique-calligraphic-font-family/9855321")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414043025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Msmall_5884.png)
author: Catharsis

comments.content: In case anyone was waiting for it, the guidebook for Maestrale Manual is available from the Gallery on the MyFonts page. Try out a few combinations in the test window if you're feeling playful. ;o)
